title: The Mr. Frog Show
description: The iconic Mr. Frog in his long-running, record-breaking show that caused nationwide Frogmania.
quote: I’m Mr. Frog. This is my show. I ate the bug.
altHero: Mr. Frog, a frog with long arms in brown shorts, smiles in a swamp
alt1: Mr. Frog talks to a long-nosed bug sitting on a rock
alt2: Mr. Frog shoves the bug into his wide open mouth
alt3: a business man with bulging red eyes angrily shoves a contract in Mr. Frog’s face
alt4: the business man screams in terror as Mr. Frog eats him
